about_the_game:
Welcome to Dinosaurs in Place!

Are you ready to embark on a prehistoric adventure? In Dinosaurs in Place, you'll meet 40 unique dinosaurs, each with its own shape and character. Your task is to place them on the grid so that they fit perfectly into the allotted space.

Battle through 100 exciting levels, each of which will challenge your logic and imagination. Move and rotate the dinosaur figures to find the perfect combination.

Key Features:

  • 40 Unique Dinosaurs
    Collect a roster of 40 hand-drawn dinosaurs of various shapes and sizes, each bringing its own unique challenges.

  • 100 Thoughtfully Designed Levels
    Dive into 100 levels that will keep your mind sharp and provide hours of engaging gameplay.

  • Simple and Intuitive Controls
    Navigate effortlessly using the left and right mouse buttons — perfect for players of all skill levels. Simply grab a figure with the left mouse button and move it to the desired spot, then rotate it with the right mouse button for a perfect fit.

  • Atmospheric Musical Accompaniment
    Enjoy relaxing music and sounds that transport you to the captivating world of dinosaurs.

  • Convenient Hint System
    Stuck on a level? Don’t worry! The game features a hint system that will highlight possible placement spots for your figures, helping you advance without any hassle.

Dinosaurs in Place is the perfect blend of captivating puzzles and stunning graphics, offering you hours of delightful entertainment. Join our prehistoric world and showcase your logical skills!

name: Dinosaurs in Place

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB +
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In this exciting two-dimensional puzzle game, you need to place your prehistoric friends on the grid so that they fit perfectly. Dinosaurs in Place offers 100 unique levels and 40 diverse dinosaurs that will not leave you indifferent.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Greek, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
